GapFillInput.Title: Present simple with I, you, we and they â€“ positive form
GapFillInput.Instruction: Type the correct verb from the word pool in each gap.

Content.Question:
1. Carla and I have a nice cat.
2. You have a beautiful garden.
3. They live in a small flat in the centre of the city.
4. I work for a small company near the station.
5. You study|work at the university.
6. The girls study languages at the university.
7. I live alone in a big flat near the park.
8. We work with computers.
9. David and Mark live with their parents in the city.
10. I work|study a lot.
